column2: On an average day, how many hours do you spend…On a TV set (such as watching live TV or TV, movies, or other video (such as Netflix) through Xbox, Roku, DVR, Smart TV; playing video games)
On an average day, how many minutes do you spend…On a TV set (such as watching live TV or TV, movies, or other video (such as Netflix) through Xbox, Roku, DVR, Smart TV; playing video games)
On an average day, how many hours do you spend…On a Desktop or Laptop Computer (such as spending time online, playing games, watching video)
On an average day, how many minutes do you spend…On a Desktop or Laptop Computer (such as spending time online, playing games, watching video)
On an average day, how many hours do you spend…On Your Smartphone or Tablet (such as spending time on apps, spending time online, playing games, watching video, etc.)
On an average day, how many minutes do you spend…On Your Smartphone or Tablet (such as spending time on apps, spending time online, playing games, watching video, etc.)
On an average day, how much time do you spend on any social media site (ex: Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Pinterest, Snapchat)?
